Customers like the color, with one describing it as perfect pink, and they appreciate its stretchiness. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others say it's too thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we were looking for
items.body: This dress is so cute! My daughter wore it for her homecoming dance and she got so many compliments. Perfect fit, length, and material. It is slightly stretchy material for a comfortable feel while also being high quality. Would repurchase Read more
items.author: Rick Woods

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect
items.body: I cannot say enough great things about this dress. I would give it 15/10 stars if I could. It was sooo flattering. So comfy, the mesh is so soft and stretchy. Not see through at all. So comfortable, I could wear it to sleep if I wanted. The scrunching is so perfectly placed, can hide imperfections or a little extra skin/fat. The color is absolutely beautiful. I got so many compliments and felt beautiful. Wore it for an outside wedding in July and did not feel like I was suffocating from the dress, very airy and ventilated The length was perfect, could probably be a great length for different heights. The stretch was perfect, could possibly work for maternity dress, sizing accordingly. I could see a bump fitting fine, lots of stretch. The opening in the front was good length, didnâ€™t feel like my undies would show if I sat down or opened legs too much. Comfortably danced in it all night. Did not ride up at all all night. The high neck was so classy. All in all, my favorite dress of the year. Iâ€™m 5â€™4, 135 lbs, 34 DD. Size medium Read more
items.author: Familia Llanos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute.
items.body: Great fit. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable. Looks like a good quality. I'm 5'3'' and 145lbs. I ordered an M, but I feel like I could have used an S because the dress was still a little bit looser on me than what I would have wanted to be. But overall, great product. Read more
items.author: Sheyla Guzman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth it
items.body: Comfortable, cute, flowy, flattering, fits true to size and is so so soft. The material is light and breathable, soft and comfortable and durable! Washed nicely in a washing machine and dryer. Itâ€™s perfect for a casual party, or nice dinner date with the hubby. Read more
items.author: Jessica E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sexy yet modest, comfy, hugs curves
items.body: I bought this as a backup to wear to an event because I have too many black dresses and wanted to wear another dress I bought that was green. Well I put this one on and said wow ok screw the green dress this one is amazing. The material is a polyester type so it really stretches and hugs curves super well. Iâ€™m 5â€™1â€ and 105 lbs and I got the small which was perfect for me. I think itâ€™s true to size because it does stretch a lot. The material being a polyester/spandex type makes it look like it could look cheap on you when you wear it but all that doubt disappeared when I put it on because it looked really fantastic and you couldnâ€™t even really notice the material when I wore it (at least the black color). The shape was really quite pretty too with the ruffles higher in the front. It looked really nice when walking and posing for pics. AND it was SOOO comfortable all night. I put it on and felt like I wouldnâ€™t have to be adjusting it all night and I felt like I didnâ€™t need to wear a bra and was just so comfy all night. If youâ€™re considering this dress but worried of buying one off amazon, I would encourage you to try this one!! Read more
items.author: H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful summer/fall dress
items.body: Obsessed with this dress!! Bought last minute for an end of September wedding & it was perfect! Not see through & the material was light but was also warm with the double layers. Iâ€™m short 4â€11 & the back of the dress only just touched the ground when Iâ€™m not wearing heels so itâ€™s a perfect length for the short girlies! Super stretchy material so you can definitely get away with sizing down. Iâ€™m 4â€11, 110lbs between a small & medium & I went with a small & I was comfortable all night! Would definitely recommend getting this dress! Read more
items.author: Kalani Rose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs Tight
items.body: The dress was beautiful but ran a bit small. I'm 5'5, 133 lbs, size 4/small and this dress was snug. I ended up returning for a medium and that fit better, but was a bit longer than I expected. Read more
items.author: Chelsea K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product!
items.body: I bought this for my wedding shower coming up and it will be perfect! Very good quality materials. Itâ€™s got a soft stretchy mesh material over it that gives it the scrunchie look. The colors of both materials match each other perfectly and are just like pictured. It is a bit tighter than I was anticipating based off of the size chart. It is also a bit sheer but i did purchase a light color and like I said it is a bit tight. The bottom of it isnâ€™t quite a â€œhigh lowâ€ but rather an asymmetrical cut, with it being long in the back, and on the front the dress comes up higher on my right leg than my left. I am a bust 38F, and it doesnâ€™t stretch awkwardly across my chest at all, and itâ€™s quite flattering on my tummy. If Iâ€™m able to I will attach pictures later but I do not have any pictures presently. Read more
items.author: Delaney VanDenburgh

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail Bodycon Mermaid Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail Bodycon Mermaid Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail Bodycon Mermaid Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Pink, White, Eggplant, Dim, Rose, Sage, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
